GRAPH.title: 全省五项考核指标-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type = 10000 AND hour(first_result) =10

GRAPH.title: 地市五项考核指标-柱图
GRAPH.where: ne_type = 10003 AND hour(first_result) =10

GRAPH.title: 地市五项考核指标-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type = 10003 AND hour(first_result) =10

GRAPH.title: 全省忙时掉话率-线图
GRAPH.where: (hour(first_result)=10 or hour(first_result)=18) and ne_type =10000

GRAPH.title: 地区忙时掉话率-柱图
GRAPH.where: ne_type =10003

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时掉话率-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type =10003

GRAPH.title: 全省短消息接通率-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type =10000

GRAPH.title: PDP激活成功率(10时)-线图
GRAPH.suc_rate: 由MS发起的PDP上下文激活成功率(%)
GRAPH.where: hour(first_result) =10 and ne_type= 121

GRAPH.title: 全省PDP激活成功率(全天)-线图
GRAPH.where: sum_level=1 and ne_type =10000

GRAPH.title: 全省忙时话务掉话比－线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10000 and s_hour =10

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时话务掉话比-柱图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10003 and s_hour=10 and ne_id not in (-999999)

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时话务掉话比-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10003 and s_hour=10 and ne_id not in (-999999)

GRAPH.title: 全省忙时无线接通率-柱图
GRAPH.where: s_hour = 10 and ne_type=10000

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时无线接通率-柱图
GRAPH.where: s_hour = 10 and ne_type=10003 AND ne_id not in (-999999)

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时无线接通率-线图
GRAPH.where: s_hour = 10 and ne_type=10003 and ne_id not in (-999999)

GRAPH.title: 全省忙时最坏小区比（城市）-线图
GRAPH.where: (hour(first_result)=10 or hour(first_result)=18) and ne_type =10000

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时最坏小区比（城市）-柱图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10003

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时最坏小区比（城市）-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10003

GRAPH.title: 全省忙时信道可用率-线图
GRAPH.where: x0.first_result=x1.first_result and x0.ne_type =10003 and x0.ne_type=x1.ne_type and hour(x0.first_result) = 10 and x1.s_hour=10

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时信道可用率-线图
GRAPH.where: x0.first_result=x1.first_result and x0.ne_type =10003 and x0.ne_type=x1.ne_type and hour(x0.first_result) = 10 and x1.s_hour=10

GRAPH.title: 全省忙时最坏小区比（郊区）-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10000

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时最坏小区比（郊区）-柱图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10003

GRAPH.title: 地市忙时最坏小区比（郊区）-线图
GRAPH.where: ne_type=10003

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信和联通忙时话务量分析-线图
GRAPH.seize_traf: 时与移动忙时总话务量
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id in (53,51,52)

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信和联通忙时话务量分析-柱图
移动与电信和联通忙时话务量分析-线图
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id in (53,51,52)

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信忙时来话去话话务量比例分析-线图
GRAPH.aa: 时与移动忙时来话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.bb: 时与移动忙时去话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id = 53 and ne_type=10000

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信忙时来话去话话务量比例分析-柱图(地市)
GRAPH.aa: 时与移动忙时来话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.bb: 时与移动忙时去话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id = 53 and ne_type=10003 and ne_id in (-1483444163,-1205918901,-1423354781)

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信忙时来话去话话务量比例分析-线图
GRAPH.aa: 时与移动忙时来话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.bb: 时与移动忙时去话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id = 53 and ne_type=10003

GRAPH.title: 移动与联通忙时话务量比例分析-线图
GRAPH.aa: 时与移动忙时来话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.bb: 时与移动忙时去话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id in (51,52) and ne_type=10000

GRAPH.title: 移动与联通忙时话务量比例分析-柱图
GRAPH.aa: 时与移动忙时来话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.bb: 时与移动忙时去话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id in (51,52) and ne_type=10003 and ne_id in (-1483444163)

GRAPH.title: 移动与联通忙时话务量比例分析-线图
GRAPH.aa: 时与移动忙时来话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.bb: 时与移动忙时去话话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: s_hour in(10,18) and sv_cat_id=5 and sv_id in (51,52) and ne_type=10003

GRAPH.title: 移动与联通忙时话务量比例分析-线图
GRAPH.bb: 时移动到联通话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: b.compress_date=a.compress_date and a.ne_type=10000 and a.ne_type=b.ne_type and a.s_hour in(10,18) and b.s_hour=a.s_hour and b. sv_cat_id=5 and b.sv_id in (51,52)

GRAPH.title: 移动与联通忙时话务量比例分析(地市)-柱图
GRAPH.bb: 时移动到联通话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: b.compress_date=a.compress_date and a.ne_type=10003 and a.ne_type=b.ne_type and a.s_hour in(10,18) and b.s_hour=a.s_hour and b. sv_cat_id=5 and b.sv_id in (51,52)

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信忙时话务量比例分析-线图
GRAPH.bb: 时移动到电信话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: b.s_hour in(10,18) and a.ne_type=b.ne_type and a.ne_type=10000 and b.compress_date=a.compress_date and b.s_hour=a.s_hour and b. sv_cat_id=5 and b.sv_id = 53

GRAPH.title: 移动与电信忙时话务量比例分析-柱图(地市)
GRAPH.bb: 时移动到电信话务量占总话务量的比例
GRAPH.where: b.s_hour in(10,18) and a.ne_type=b.ne_type and a.ne_type=10003 and b.compress_date=a.compress_date and b.s_hour=a.s_hour and b. sv_cat_id=5 and b.sv_id = 53

GRAPH.come: 省全天联通送来短信成功率
